original_text: If you are only kind to your friends, then you are not doing anything special. Even people who do not believe in God do that.
korean_text: 또 너희가 너희 형제에게만 문안하면 남보다 더하는 것이 무엇이냐 이방인들도 이같이 아니하느냐

sentences.original_text: If you are only kind to your friends
then you are not doing anything special
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신은 특별한 아무것도 하지 않는 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Even people who do not believe in God
